paragraphs.body: Menville, born to animator Chuck Menville, was the bassist for the Southern California rock band Boy Hits Car until he left the band in 2006. He was one of the group's founding members.
paragraphs.text: Menville, born to animator Chuck Menville, was the bassist for the Southern California rock band Boy Hits Car until he left the band in 2006. He was one of the group's founding members.

paragraphs.body: Most famous for his voice acting skills, Menville's first role came in 1979 in an episode of Scooby Doo and Scrappy Doo. Some of his best-known roles are Robin on Teen Titans, Lloyd Irving on Tales of Symphonia, Freddy Flintstone on The Flintstone Kids, a role he took over from Lennie Weinrib, and Ma-Ti on Captain Planet and the Planeteers.
paragraphs.text: Most famous for his voice acting skills, Menville's first role came in 1979 in an episode of Scooby Doo and Scrappy Doo. Some of his best-known roles are Robin on Teen Titans, Lloyd Irving on Tales of Symphonia, Freddy Flintstone on The Flintstone Kids, a role he took over from Lennie Weinrib, and Ma-Ti on Captain Planet and the Planeteers.

paragraphs.body: Menville has also participated in live-action roles. He appeared in Ernest Goes to Camp as Crutchfield and had recurring roles on Full House as Kimmy Gibbler's boyfriend, Duane, and on The Wonder Years as Wayne's best friend, Wart.
